text: (Napiye!) Vetattaiyutaiyoril cilar irukkirarkal;. Avarkalitam nir oru (por) kuviyalai oppataittalum, avarkal atai (oru kuraivum illamal, ketkumpotu) um'mitam tiruppik kotuttu vituvarkal;. Avarkalil innum cilar irukkirarkal. Avarkalitam oru (kacai) tinarai oppataittalum, nir avarkalitam totarntu ninru kettaloliya, avarkal atai umakkut tiruppik kotukkamattarkal. Atarkuk karanam, 'pamararkalitam (iruntu nam etaik kaipparrik kontalum) nam'mai kurram pitikka (avarkalukku) valiyillai' enru avarkal kuruvatutan;. Melum, avarkal arintu konte allahvin peril poy kurukirarkal
